thread.title: Jedi Knights mom
thread.title_full: Thread Logic reviewed by Jedi Knights mom

author: Jedi Knights mom
title: Jedi Knights mom
text: I was looking for a hat for the parents on our little league baseball team to wear in support of our team...threadlogic was super easy to work with, great execution and quick. The hats are more than I would prefer to pay, but the quality is good. Pleased with our team purchase. Thanks threadlogic!
